name: Keep in touch
description:
This is a story about a young hot girl Melanie. One day she goes shopping. Speaking on the phone in the dressing room, she will start share her sexual fantasies with her girlfriend. When it gets very hot, she does not hold back and starts to "melt".features
  • Visual Novel game with Sexy Content.
  • A cute and fun well written story-line.
  • High quality backgrounds.
  • 1080p window & Full Screen Options.
  • Steam achievements
